creator: telcik@iinet.net.au
text:
The org.apache.log4j.performance.NullAppender.class file is missing from the 
log4j.jar and log4j-core.jar jar files. However, it does appear in the 
dist/classes directory. A small problem with the build process, perhaps ?

This appears to be a repeat of bug # 859 which occurred in Log4j 1.0.4

creator: ceki@apache.org
text: The performance directory is not included in the jars.
